item.title: The Vatican installs chimney to signal the selection of the next pope
item.description: Ahead of the election of the next pope, a chimney was installed atop the Sistine Chapel on Friday, which will help notify the public of the 267th pope...

item.title: Sovereignty beats out favorite Journalism to win the Kentucky Derby
item.description: The victory hands Venezuelan jockey Junior Alvarado his first career win in the Kentucky Derby. Sovereignty's trainer, Bill Mott, has won the Kentucky...

item.title: Florida lawmakers try to balance condo safety with cost
item.description: Florida lawmakers have sent the governor a bill that would provide financial relief to condo owners. The measure softens mandates passed after the dea...

item.title: Actress and 'Laugh-In' comedian Ruth Buzzi dies at 88
item.description: Buzzi, who was best known for her regular appearances on the NBC variety TV show Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In , died on Thursday at her home in Texas.

item.title: A telescope's powerful new tool may offer a better way to predict solar storms
item.description: The Daniel K. Inouye telescope snapped a clear image of sunspots.
